data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hi,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ 0 d,
rw hi,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c' hi,
rw add_zero (a + b),
rw add_zero b,
refl,

rw add_succ (a + b) c',
rw add_succ b c',
rw add_succ a (b + c'),
rw hi,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw add_zero (succ a),
rw add_zero a,
refl,

rw add_succ (succ a) b',
rw hi,
rw add_succ a b',
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw add_zero a,
rw zero_add a,
refl,

rw add_succ a b',
rw hi,
rw succ_add b' a,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ n 0,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_assoc a c b,
rw add_comm c b,
rw add_assoc a b c,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with m' hi,
rw mul_zero 0,
refl,

rw mul_succ 0 m',
rw add_zero (0 * m'),
rw hi,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ m 0,
rw mul_zero m,
rw zero_add m,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
induction m with m' hi,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

rw mul_succ (succ 0) m',
rw hi,
rw add_succ m' 0,
rw add_zero m',
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw add_zero a,
rw mul_zero t,
rw add_zero (t * a),
refl,


rw add_succ a b',
rw mul_succ t (a + b'),
rw hi,
rw mul_succ t b',
rw add_assoc ( t * a ) (t * b') t,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c' hi,
rw mul_zero (a * b),
rw mul_zero b,
rw mul_zero a,
refl,

rw mul_succ ( a * b) c',
rw hi,
rw mul_succ b c',
rw mul_add a (b * c') b,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw mul_zero (succ a),
rw add_zero (a * 0),
rw mul_zero a,
refl,


rw mul_succ (succ a) b',
rw mul_succ a b',
rw add_assoc (a * b') a (succ b'),
rw add_succ a b',
rw hi,
rw add_comm a b',
rw add_assoc (a * b') b' (succ a),
rw add_succ b' a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw add_zero a,
rw zero_mul t,
rw add_zero (a * t),
refl,

rw add_succ a b',
rw succ_mul b' t,
rw succ_mul (a + b') t,
rw hi,
rw add_assoc (a * t) (b' * t) t,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw mul_zero a,
rw zero_mul a,
refl,

rw mul_succ a b',
rw hi,
rw succ_mul b' a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
rw mul_comm a (b * c),
rw mul_comm a c,
rw mul_assoc b c a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero 0,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ 0 m,
rw mul_zero (0 ^ m ),
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ a 0,
rw pow_zero a,
rw one_mul a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with m' hi,
rw pow_zero 1,
refl,

rw pow_succ 1 m',
rw hi,
rw mul_one 1,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n' hi,
rw add_zero m,
rw pow_zero a,
rw mul_one (a ^ m),
refl,

rw add_succ m n',
rw pow_succ a (m + n'),
rw pow_succ a n',
rw hi,
rw mul_assoc (a ^ m) (a ^ n') a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n' hi,
rw pow_zero (a*b),
rw pow_zero b,
rw pow_zero a,
rw mul_one 1,
refl,

rw pow_succ (a * b),
rw pow_succ a n',
rw mul_assoc (a ^ n') a (b ^ succ n'),
rw mul_comm a (b ^ succ n'),
rw pow_succ b n',
rw mul_assoc (b ^ n') b a,
rw mul_comm b a,
rw hi,
rw mul_assoc (a ^ n') (b ^ n') (a * b),
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n' hi,
rw pow_zero (a ^ m),
rw mul_zero m,
rw pow_zero a,
refl,

rw pow_succ (a ^ m) n',
rw mul_succ m n',
rw hi,
rw pow_add a (m * n') m ,
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
rw pow_zero ( a + b),
rw pow_zero a,
rw pow_zero b,
rw one_mul (a + b),
rw one_mul a,
rw one_mul b,
rw succ_mul (succ 0) a,
rw succ_mul 0 a,
rw zero_mul a,
rw zero_add a,
rw add_mul a b (a + b),
rw mul_add a a b,
rw mul_add b a b,
rw add_mul a a b,
rw mul_comm a b,
rw add_assoc (a * a) (b * a) (b * a + b * b),
rw add_assoc (a * a) (b * b) (b * a + b * a),
rw add_comm (b * b) (b * a + b * a),
rw add_assoc (b * a) (b * a) (b *b),
refl,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 3*n+2,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have r := i(q),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have r := i(q),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro  pqr,
intro pq,
intro p,
have qr := pqr(p),
have q := pq(p),
have r := qr(q),
exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq, 
intro qf,
intro p,
have q := pq(p),
have f := qf(q),
exact f,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qe,
intro p,
have q := pq(p),
have e := qe(q),
exact e,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
have b := f1(a),
have e := f2(b),
have f := f5(e),
have g := f8(f),
have j := f9(g),
have i := f11(j),
have l := f15(i),
exact l,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pqr,
intro pq,
intro p,
have q := pq(p),
have qr:= pqr(p),
have r := qr(q),
exact r,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qr,
intro p,
apply qr,
have q := pq(p),
exact q,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intro nq,
intro p,
have q := pq(p),
have false := nq(q),
exact false,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
cases pq with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qr,
cases pq with p q,
split,
exact p,
cases qr with q' r,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with pq qp,
intro h', 
cases h' with qr rq,
split,
intro p,
have q:= pq(p),
have r:= qr(q),
exact r,
intro r,
have q:= rq(r),
have p:= qp(q),
exact p,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with pq qp,
intro h', 
cases h' with qr rq,
split,
intro p,
have q:= pq(p),
have r:= qr(q),
exact r,
intro r,
have q:= rq(r),
have p:= qp(q),
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro porq,
cases porq with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
cases h with p qorr,
cases qorr with q r,
left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,
right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,
intro h,
cases h with pq pr,
cases pq with p q,
split,
exact p,
left,
exact q,
cases pr with p r,
split,
exact p,
right,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
rw not_iff_imp_false,
intro h,
cases h with p np,
have f := np(p),
exfalso,
exact f,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P; by_cases q : Q,
intro h,
intro p',
exact q,
intro h,
intro p',
have np := h(q),
exfalso,
apply np,
exact p',
intro h,
intro p',
exact q,
intro h,
intro p',
exfalso,
apply p,
exact p',

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have h := succ_inj(hs),
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have hs := succ_inj(h),
have hss:= succ_inj(hs),
exact hss,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h1,
have h:= succ_inj(h1),
exact h,
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t with n hi,
rw add_zero a at h,
rw add_zero b at h,
exact h,

rw add_succ a n at h,
rw add_succ b n at h,
have h1 := succ_inj(h),
have ab := hi(h1),
exact ab,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm t a,
rw add_comm t b,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h, 
rw <- add_zero a at h,
rw add_assoc a 0 b at h,
rw zero_add b at h,
rw add_left_cancel a b 0,
refl,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with b',
refl,
rw add_succ at H,
exfalso,

have h := succ_ne_zero (a + b'),
have f := h(H),
exact f,

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm a b,
intro h,
have h1:= add_left_eq_zero(h),
exact h1,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ d 0,
rw add_zero d,
refl,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n' hi,
exact zero_ne_succ 0,

rw succ_eq_add_one,
rw add_comm n' 1,
rw <- add_succ 1 n',
intro h,
have h1:= add_left_cancel 1 n' (succ n'),
have h2:= h1(h),
have f := hi(h2),
exact f,

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h1,
intro h2,
intro h3,
induction b with b' hi,
have f:= h2(h3),
exact f,
rw mul_succ a b' at h3,
have h:= add_left_eq_zero(h3),
have f:= h1(h),
exact f,

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
right,
refl,
rw mul_succ a b' at h,
have h1:= add_left_eq_zero(h),
left,
exact h1,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
have h1 := eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b,
have h2 := h1(h),
exact h2,
intro h,
cases h with a b,
rw a,
rw zero_mul b,
refl,
rw b,
rw mul_zero a,
refl,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c' hi generalizing b,
intro h,
rw mul_zero a at h,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff at h,
cases h with a b,
exfalso,
exact ha(a),
exact b,
intro h,
cases b,
rw mul_zero at h,
symmetry at h,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff a (succ c') at h,
cases h,
exfalso,
exact ha(h),
symmetry at h,
exact h,

rw mul_succ a b at h,
rw mul_succ a c' at h,
rw add_right_cancel_iff at h,
have h1:= hi(b),
apply succ_eq_succ_of_eq,
exact h1(h),

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean:
theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry
